page.title: 17SUNNINGHILL VILLAGE
page.content: There is a wide range of shops in Sunninghill including butchers,grocers ,hairdressers,small food shops,news- agents and a take-away.There is also a small cinema(art deco in style)known affectionately as the "flea-pit". There is also a small concert hall and just off the high street is a Post Office.For eating out the Jade Fountain provides chinese cuisine for the discerning palate.There are many pubs in Sunninghill including The 3 Jays,Dog and Partridge and the Duke's Head.If you wish to stay in the area there are a couple of hotels-the Bery- stede and Highclere House Hotel. Near St.Michael's Church of England Primary School there is a small library.For those with cars there is parking near the school or on the high street if you are lucky!Being near Ascot it is a popular place for race-goers.
